Ericsson's quarterly statistics on the global internet market

Ericsson's quarterly statistics on the global internet market — Ina Fried: “By 2020, 90 percent of the world’s population over six years old will have a mobile phone.” For follow-up reading, see Nicholas Carr’s essay “Is Google Making Us Stupid?”
